data.title: The JMI Global program
data.meta_description: The official program for the JMI Global + AGA!
data.text:
Trust Mutekwa is a teacher who has been working with the mbira instrument for more than 20 years. He created the Ticha Muzavazi's Nyunga Mbira Handbook that has made life easy for mbira teachers and students. Trust Mutekwa, currently works with student teachers at Nyamata Teacher Training College in Rwanda, is a Swedish Institute Scholar and a Fulbright Teaching Excellence and Achievement Fellow whose contribution to education and the teaching profession took him to the shortlist for the Global Teacher Prize, 2020.

DJ Abisha Palmer is a Zim dancehall DJ legend, rising to popularity through his radio show Judgement Yard and performing across the country on a regular basis. A true entertainer, he always flies the Zimbabwean flag high, showcasing local artists alongside international favourites. A promoter, organiser and public figure, Mr. Palmer knows how to get the party started!

â€‹

King Her is an open format DJ born in Harare of Zimbabwean and Japanese heritage. A multidisciplinary artist with diplomas in Multimedia and Graphic Design, she developed a unique approach to music that incorporates her love for aesthetics and dance. King Her is also a Radio Host, Television Presenter and Producer.
